dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A glittering gala at The Dorchester Hotel in London, celebrating the absolute pinnacle of global real estate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A glittering gala at The Dorchester Hotel in London, celebrating the absolute pinnacle of global real estate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, the International Property Awards. They just held their big ceremony on December 3rd, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, the International Property Awards. They just held their big ceremony on December third, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's a massive deal—over 1800 entries from 110 different countries this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's a massive deal-over eighteen hundred entries from one hundred ten different countries this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That is a huge number. And the judging panel, it's chaired by four UK Lords, which is pretty serious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is a huge number. And the judging panel, it's chaired by four U K Lords, which is pretty serious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And Stewart Shield, the president, he was saying that winning one of these is like, uh, an instant global symbol of excellence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And Stewart Shield, the president, he was saying that winning one of these is like, uh, an instant global symbol of excellence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really sets a company apart, doesn't it? Proves their professionalism on a worldwide stage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really sets a company apart, doesn't it? Proves their professionalism on a worldwide stage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the categories are so broad—48 of them, covering everything from residential to commercial properties all over the world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the categories are so broadminus forty eight of them, covering everything from residential to commercial properties all over the world.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They even have regional events, like in Bangkok and Toronto, before the main London gala.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They even have regional events, like in Bangkok and Toronto, before the main London gala.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a whole year-long programme, honestly. The scale is just immense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a whole year-long programme, honestly. The scale is just immense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And that logo winners get? Apparently it's instantly recognizable in the industry. A real badge of honor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And that logo winners get? Apparently it's instantly recognizable in the industry. A real badge of honor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what it takes to even get nominated with that level of competition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what it takes to even get nominated with that level of competition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. To stand out among entries from over a hundred countries… that's the dream for any firm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. To stand out among entries from over a hundred countries... that's the dream for any firm.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're already looking ahead to next year's awards, 2020-21. Tina Ross is the contact for that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're already looking ahead to next year's awards, twenty twenty to twenty one. Tina Ross is the contact for that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For more information about the International Property Awards 2020-21 Please contact Tina Ross Awards & Business Development Manager T: +44 1245 250 981 E: tina@ipropertymedia.com W: www.propertyawards.net

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Business Development Manager. Must be a busy person right about now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Business Development Manager. Must be a busy person right about now.
